forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain. Cloudy, with a low around 55. South wind 12 to 18 mph, with gusts as high as 30 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%. New rainfall amounts between a half and three quarters of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Monday
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain before 5pm, then rain and patchy fog. Cloudy. High near 58, with temperatures falling to around 54 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 7 to 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

weather_report:
As the early hours of the morning unfold over Downtown San Francisco, a steady rain begins to nurture the city's landscape, draping it in a thick veil of cloud cover. The temperature hovers around a mild 55 degrees, a fitting companion to the relentless patter of raindrops on rooftops and the soft whispers of gusty winds blowing from the south. This nocturnal symphony offers a palpable sense of solace, inviting the weary into a world that feels both intimate and elemental. 

Come morning, the rain will persist until early afternoon, wrapping the city in a cloak of chill and dampness. The forecast hints at patchy fog emerging later in the day, mingling with the rain and further obfuscating your view of distant hills and landmarks. Those venturing into the city should prepare for a chill, favoring layers that can insulate against both the cool air and wetness—perhaps a water-resistant jacket paired with comfortable, warm boots. Portland's cafes beckon with the promise of freshly brewed coffee, while a stroll beneath an umbrella may reveal the unique beauty of a rain-kissed city—its bright colors rendered more vivid against the gray palette of the day. As the brisk winds deliver a refreshing bite, consider the quiet charm of a local art exhibit, where the vibrancy of creativity stands in stark contrast to the day's dreariness.
